verses.verse: וַיִּשְׁלַ֧ח <WH7971> sent יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> נָתָ֖ן <WH5416> Nathan אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִ֑ד <WH1732> unto David וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> And he came אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> to him וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> unto him and said לוֹ֙ שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> unto him There were two אֲנָשִׁ֗ים <WH582> men הָיוּ֙ <WH1961> become בְּעִ֣יר <WH5892> city אֶחָ֔ת <WH259> in one אֶחָ֥ד <WH259> the one עָשִׁ֖יר <WH6223> rich וְאֶחָ֥ד <WH259> and the other רָֽאשׁ׃ <WH7326> poor
לְעָשִׁ֗יר <WH6223> The rich הָיָ֛ה <WH1961> had צֹ֥אן <WH6629> flocks וּבָקָ֖ר <WH1241> and herds הַרְבֵּ֥ה <WH7235> many מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> [man] had exceeding

וְלָרָ֣שׁ <WH7326> But the poor אֵֽין־ <WH369> else כֹּ֗ל <WH3605> all manner כִּי֩ <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo כִּבְשָׂ֨ה <WH3535> ewe lamb אַחַ֤ת <WH259> [man] had nothing save one קְטַנָּה֙ <WH6996> little אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> Which קָנָ֔ה <WH7069> which he had bought וַיְחַיֶּ֕הָ <WH2421> and nourished up וַתִּגְדַּ֥ל <WH1431> and it grew up עִמּ֛וֹ <WH5973> with וְעִם־ <WH5973> with בָּנָ֖יו <WH1121> with him and with his children יַחְדָּ֑ו <WH3162> together מִפִּתּ֨וֹ <WH6595> of his own meat תֹאכַ֜ל <WH398> it did eat וּמִכֹּס֤וֹ <WH3563> of his own cup תִשְׁתֶּה֙ <WH8354> and drank וּבְחֵיק֣וֹ <WH2436> in his bosom תִשְׁכָּ֔ב <WH7901> and lay וַתְּהִי־ <WH1961> become ל֖וֹ כְּבַֽת׃ <WH1323> and was unto him as a daughter

וַיָּ֣בֹא <WH935> And there came הֵלֶךְ֮ <WH1982> a traveller לְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man הֶֽעָשִׁיר֒ <WH6223> unto the rich וַיַּחְמֹ֗ל <WH2550> and he spared לָקַ֤חַת <WH3947> to take מִצֹּאנוֹ֙ <WH6629> of his own flock וּמִבְּקָר֔וֹ <WH1241> and of his own herd לַעֲשׂ֕וֹת <WH6213> to dress לָאֹרֵ֖חַ <WH732> for the wayfaring man הַבָּא־ <WH935> that was come ל֑וֹ וַיִּקַּ֗ח <WH3947> unto him but took אֶת־ <WH853> כִּבְשַׂת֙ <WH3535> lamb הָאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man's הָרָ֔אשׁ <WH7326> the poor וַֽיַּעֲשֶׂ֔הָ <WH6213> and dressed לָאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> it for the man הַבָּ֥א <WH935> that was come אֵלָֽיו׃ <WH413> about

וַיִּֽחַר־ <WH2734> kindled אַ֥ף <WH639> anger דָּוִ֛ד <WH1732> And David's בָּאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> against the man מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> was greatly וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> and he said אֶל־ <WH413> to נָתָ֔ן <WH5416> to Nathan חַי־ <WH2416> liveth יְהוָ֕ה <WH3068> [As] the LORD כִּ֣י <WH3588> surely בֶן־ <WH1121> this [thing] shall surely מָ֔וֶת <WH4194> die הָאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> the man הָעֹשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> that hath done זֹֽאת׃ <WH2063> likewise

וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַכִּבְשָׂ֖ה <WH3535> the lamb יְשַׁלֵּ֣ם <WH7999> And he shall restore אַרְבַּעְתָּ֑יִם <WH706> fourfold עֵ֗קֶב <WH6118> because אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> and because עָשָׂה֙ <WH6213> he did אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> this thing הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this וְעַ֖ל <WH5921> and אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no חָמָֽל׃ <WH2550> he had no pity

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> said נָתָ֛ן <WH5416> And Nathan אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִ֖ד <WH1732> to David אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> You הָאִ֑ישׁ <WH376> Thou [art] the man כֹּה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֨ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel אָנֹכִ֞י <WH595> is I מְשַׁחְתִּ֤יךָֽ <WH4886> I anointed לְמֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> thee king עַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> over Israel וְאָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> and I הִצַּלְתִּ֖יךָ <WH5337> and I delivered מִיַּ֥ד <WH3027> thee out of the hand שָׁאֽוּל׃ <WH7586> of Saul

וָאֶתְּנָ֨ה <WH5414> And I gave לְךָ֜ אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house אֲדֹנֶ֗יךָ <WH113> thee thy master's וְאֶת־ <WH853> נְשֵׁ֤י <WH802> wives אֲדֹנֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH113> and thy master's בְּחֵיקֶ֔ךָ <WH2436> into thy bosom וָאֶתְּנָ֣ה <WH5414> and gave לְךָ֔ אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> thee the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel וִֽיהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> and of Judah וְאִ֨ם־ <WH518> and if מְעָ֔ט <WH4592> and if [that had been] too little וְאֹסִ֥פָה <WH3254> I would moreover have given לְּךָ֖ כָּהֵ֥נָּה <WH2007> unto thee such וְכָהֵֽנָּה׃ <WH2007> and such things

מַדּ֜וּעַ <WH4069> Why בָּזִ֣יתָ ׀ <WH959> Wherefore hast thou despised אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבַ֣ר <WH1697> the commandment יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> to do הָרַע֮ <WH7451> evil [בְּעֵינֹו כ] (בְּעֵינַי֒ <WH5869> affliction ק) אֵ֣ת <WH853> אוּרִיָּ֤ה <WH223> Uriah הַֽחִתִּי֙ <WH2850> the Hittite הִכִּ֣יתָ <WH5221> down בַחֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> with the sword וְאֶ֨ת־ <WH853> אִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <WH802> his wife לָקַ֥חְתָּ <WH3947> and hast taken לְּךָ֖ לְאִשָּׁ֑ה <WH802> [to be] thy wife וְאֹת֣וֹ <WH853> הָרַ֔גְתָּ <WH2026> and hast slain בְּחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> him with the sword בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <WH5983> of Ammon

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now לֹא־ <WH3808> not תָס֥וּר <WH5493> depart חֶ֛רֶב <WH2719> Now therefore the sword מִבֵּיתְךָ֖ <WH1004> from thine house עַד־ <WH5704> against עוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> alway עֵ֚קֶב <WH6118> because כִּ֣י <WH3588> for בְזִתָ֔נִי <WH959> thou hast despised וַתִּקַּ֗ח <WH3947> me and hast taken אֶת־ <WH853> אֵ֙שֶׁת֙ <WH802> the wife אוּרִיָּ֣ה <WH223> of Uriah הַחִתִּ֔י <WH2850> the Hittite לִהְי֥וֹת <WH1961> become לְךָ֖ לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> to be thy wife ס

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD הִנְנִי֩ <WH2005> behold מֵקִ֨ים <WH6965> Behold I will raise up עָלֶ֤יךָ <WH5921> against רָעָה֙ <WH7451> evil מִבֵּיתֶ֔ךָ <WH1004> against thee out of thine own house וְלָקַחְתִּ֤י <WH3947> and I will take אֶת־ <WH853> נָשֶׁ֙יךָ֙ <WH802> thy wives לְעֵינֶ֔יךָ <WH5869> before thine eyes וְנָתַתִּ֖י <WH5414> and give לְרֵעֶ֑יךָ <WH7453> [them] unto thy neighbour וְשָׁכַב֙ <WH7901> and he shall lie עִם־ <WH5973> with נָשֶׁ֔יךָ <WH802> with thy wives לְעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> in the sight הַשֶּׁ֥מֶשׁ <WH8121> of this sun הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> likewise

כִּ֥י <WH3588> Indeed אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you עָשִׂ֣יתָ <WH6213> For thou didst בַסָּ֑תֶר <WH5643> [it] secretly וַאֲנִ֗י <WH589> I אֶעֱשֶׂה֙ <WH6213> but I will do אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> this thing הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this נֶ֥גֶד <WH5048> before כָּל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> before all Israel וְנֶ֥גֶד <WH5048> and under הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <WH8121> and before the sun ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> And David אֶל־ <WH413> to נָתָ֔ן <WH5416> unto Nathan חָטָ֖אתִי <WH2398> I have sinned לַֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> against the LORD ס וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said נָתָ֜ן <WH5416> And Nathan אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִ֗ד <WH1732> unto David גַּם־ <WH1571> also יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> The LORD הֶעֱבִ֥יר <WH5674> also hath put away חַטָּאתְךָ֖ <WH2403> thy sin לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תָמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> thou shalt not die

אֶ֗פֶס <WH657> Howbeit כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because נִאֵ֤ץ <WH5006> great occasion נִאַ֙צְתָּ֙ <WH5006> to blaspheme אֶת־ <WH853> אֹיְבֵ֣י <WH341> to the enemies יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD בַּדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> because by this deed הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this גַּ֗ם <WH1571> also הַבֵּ֛ן <WH1121> the child הַיִּלּ֥וֹד <WH3209> also [that is] born לְךָ֖ מ֥וֹת <WH4191> unto thee shall surely יָמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> die

וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> went נָתָ֖ן <WH5416> And Nathan אֶל־ <WH413> to his בֵּית֑וֹ <WH1004> unto his house וַיִּגֹּ֣ף <WH5062> struck יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> הַיֶּ֜לֶד <WH3206> the child אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after יָלְדָ֧ה <WH3205> bare אֵֽשֶׁת־ <WH802> wife אוּרִיָּ֛ה <WH223> that Uriah's לְדָוִ֖ד <WH1732> unto David וַיֵּאָנַֽשׁ׃ <WH605> and it was very sick

וַיְבַקֵּ֥שׁ <WH1245> therefore besought דָּוִ֛ד <WH1732> David אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> God בְּעַ֣ד <WH1157> for הַנָּ֑עַר <WH5288> for the child וַיָּ֤צָם <WH6684> fast דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> and David צ֔וֹם <WH6685> fast וּבָ֥א <WH935> and went in וְלָ֖ן <WH3885> all night וְשָׁכַ֥ב <WH7901> and lay אָֽרְצָה׃ <WH776> upon the earth

וַיָּקֻ֜מוּ <WH6965> arose זִקְנֵ֤י <WH2205> And the elders בֵיתוֹ֙ <WH1004> of his house עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> beside לַהֲקִימ֖וֹ <WH6965> [and went] to him to raise him up מִן־ <WH4480> from הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> from the earth וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not אָבָ֔ה <WH14> but he would וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not בָרָ֥א <WH1254> choose אִתָּ֖ם <WH854> for לָֽחֶם׃ <WH3899> bread

וַיְהִ֛י <WH1961> happened בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֖י <WH7637> And it came to pass on the seventh וַיָּ֣מָת <WH4191> died הַיָּ֑לֶד <WH3206> that the child וַיִּֽרְאוּ֩ <WH3372> feared עַבְדֵ֨י <WH5650> And the servants דָוִ֜ד <WH1732> of David לְהַגִּ֥יד <WH5046> to tell ל֣וֹ ׀ כִּי־ <WH3588> for מֵ֣ת <WH4191> was dead הַיֶּ֗לֶד <WH3206> him that the child כִּ֤י <WH3588> for אָֽמְרוּ֙ <WH559> for they said הִנֵּה֩ <WH2009> Behold בִהְי֨וֹת <WH1961> happened הַיֶּ֜לֶד <WH3206> Behold while the child חַ֗י <WH2416> was yet alive דִּבַּ֤רְנוּ <WH1696> we spake אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> about וְלֹא־ <WH3808> did not שָׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> unto him and he would not hearken בְּקוֹלֵ֔נוּ <WH6963> unto our voice וְאֵ֨יךְ <WH349> How נֹאמַ֥ר <WH559> if we tell אֵלָ֛יו <WH413> about מֵ֥ת <WH4191> is dead הַיֶּ֖לֶד <WH3206> him that the child וְעָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> himself רָעָֽה׃ <WH7451> vex

וַיַּ֣רְא <WH7200> saw דָּוִ֗ד <WH1732> But when David כִּ֤י <WH3588> that עֲבָדָיו֙ <WH5650> that his servants מִֽתְלַחֲשִׁ֔ים <WH3907> whispered וַיָּ֥בֶן <WH995> perceived דָּוִ֖ד <WH1732> David כִּ֣י <WH3588> for מֵ֣ת <WH4191> was dead הַיָּ֑לֶד <WH3206> that the child וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִ֧ד <WH1732> therefore David אֶל־ <WH413> to his עֲבָדָ֛יו <WH5650> unto his servants הֲמֵ֥ת <WH4191> dead הַיֶּ֖לֶד <WH3206> Is the child וַיֹּ֥אמְרוּ <WH559> ? And they said מֵֽת׃ <WH4191> He is dead

וַיָּקָם֩ <WH6965> arose דָּוִ֨ד <WH1732> Then David מֵהָאָ֜רֶץ <WH776> from the earth וַיִּרְחַ֣ץ <WH7364> and washed וַיָּ֗סֶךְ <WH5480> and anointed וַיְחַלֵּף֙ <WH2498> [himself] and changed [שִׂמְלֹתֹו כ] (שִׂמְלֹתָ֔יו <WH8071> apparel ק) וַיָּבֹ֥א <WH935> and came בֵית־ <WH1004> into the house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיִּשְׁתָּ֑חוּ <WH7812> and worshipped וַיָּבֹא֙ <WH935> then he came אֶל־ <WH413> to his בֵּית֔וֹ <WH1004> to his own house וַיִּשְׁאַ֕ל <WH7592> and when he required וַיָּשִׂ֥ימוּ <WH7760> they set ל֛וֹ לֶ֖חֶם <WH3899> bread וַיֹּאכַֽל׃ <WH398> before him and he did eat

וַיֹּאמְר֤וּ <WH559> Then said עֲבָדָיו֙ <WH5650> his servants אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to him מָֽה־ <WH4100> What הַדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> unto him What thing הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> is this אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> that עָשִׂ֑יתָה <WH6213> [is] this that thou hast done בַּעֲב֞וּר <WH5668> because of הַיֶּ֤לֶד <WH3206> for the child חַי֙ <WH2416> [while it was] alive צַ֣מְתָּ <WH6684> ? thou didst fast וַתֵּ֔בְךְּ <WH1058> and weep וְכַֽאֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> after מֵ֣ת <WH4191> was dead הַיֶּ֔לֶד <WH3206> but when the child קַ֖מְתָּ <WH6965> thou didst rise וַתֹּ֥אכַל <WH398> and eat לָֽחֶם׃ <WH3899> bread

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And he said בְּעוֹד֙ <WH5750> While הַיֶּ֣לֶד <WH3206> While the child חַ֔י <WH2416> was yet alive צַ֖מְתִּי <WH6684> I fasted וָֽאֶבְכֶּ֑ה <WH1058> and wept כִּ֤י <WH3588> for אָמַ֙רְתִּי֙ <WH559> for I said מִ֣י <WH4310> Who יוֹדֵ֔עַ <WH3045> Who can tell [יְחָנַּנִי כ] (וְחַנַּ֥נִי <WH2603> beseech ק) יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> [whether] GOD וְחַ֥י <WH2416> was alive הַיָּֽלֶד׃ <WH3206> to me that the child
